title: The Water cycle. - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, American Geological Institute and Bert Van Bork
brief_description:
Illustrates the constant exchange of moisture between air, land and sea. Evaporation, condensation, and the effects of the water cycle on the climate and land are closely examined.
Suitable for lower secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, American Geological Institute and Bert Van Bork
